forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4pm. Mostly sunny. High near 88, with temperatures falling to around 85 in the afternoon. West wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 11pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 65. West northwest wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 62. Northeast wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze before 5pm, then haze and a chance of rain showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 80. West wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze and a chance of rain showers before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 11pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 11pm and 2am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze between 8am and 10am. Sunny, with a high near 77. Northwest wind 0 to 5 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 55. Northeast wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze. Sunny, with a high near 84. Northwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers between 8pm and 2am. Partly cloudy. Low around 55, with temperatures rising to around 57 overnight. West wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Thursday

forecast.name: Thursday Night

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
